name: Lily Chen
testimonial: The project-based learning approach really helped me understand web development concepts deeply. I built a portfolio that helped me land my first freelance client!

name: Alex Rodriguez
testimonial: The SCSS and JavaScript modules were eye-opening. I'm now confident in creating responsive, interactive websites. The instructors were always there to help when needed.

name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial: Coming from zero coding background, this course was perfect for me. The Git and GitHub section was particularly helpful - now I can confidently collaborate with other developers.
